bike.description: Monocoque High Modulus C-7 carbon with custom weave carbon strands, Integrated aluminum cupped head tube, Double water bottle mounts.. Rear triangle: High Modulus C-7 carbon  stays with shaped ride tuned Energy Transfer Chainstay, cold forged dropout with replaceable hanger

components.description: FC-440 Fuji Carbon Monocoque Integrated 1 1/8" Carbon steerer
Shimano Ultegra SL HollowTech II w/7075 CNC 39/53T Chainrings
Shimano Ultrega SL STI shifter/brake, 20-speed Flight Deck compatible
NEW Vittoria Rubino Pro II, 700 x 23c Foldable
Shimano Ultegra SL dual pivot w/cartridge pad
Cane Creek IS-2I 1 1/8" Integrated, w/Alloy convex topcap and InterLoc spacers
